text: Cottonwood is a small unincorporated community in Coal County, Oklahoma. It is 2 miles northeast of Coalgate, Oklahoma.Shirk, George. Oklahoma Place Names, 2nd ed. University of Oklahoma Press: Norman, Oklahoma. 1987. p.60. A post office operated in Cottonwood from April 1, 1914 to December 31, 1914. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Coal County, Oklahoma Category:Unincorporated communities in Oklahoma
title: Cottonwood, Coal County, Oklahoma
